headline: Keysight Unveils Physical Layer Compliance Test Solution for HDMI to Meet Rising Demands for Ultra-High Resolution and High Dynamic Range
summary: SANTA ROSA, Calif., August 27, 2025--Keysight Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: KEYS) announced the release of its enhanced physical layer compliance test solution for high-definition multimedia interface (HDMI), delivering robust compliance and performance validation capabilities for transmitter [source] and cable devices. The Keysight Electrical Performance, Validation, and Compliance Test Solution for HDMI addresses the growing complexity, and bandwidth demands of modern HDMI applications, including

headline: Network Emulator Industry Company Evaluation Report 2025 | Spirent Communications, Keysight Technologies, and VIAVI Solutions Lead with Innovations, Strategic Deals, and Advanced Testing Portfolios
summary: The Network Emulator Companies Quadrant delivers in-depth analysis of the global Network Emulator market, outlining key players, technological advancements, and emerging trends. Evaluating over 100 companies, the 360 Quadrants highlights the Top 15 Network Emulator Companies, recognized as quadrant leaders.
